duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure compliance with all regulatory requirements and reporting related to pipeline safety and environmental regulations.
Manage all external reporting requirements and permits, ensuring compliance with regulatory entities.
Implement regulatory management system improvements, work processes, and procedures where gaps exist.
Lead facility implementation of new pipeline regulatory requirements and changes to existing requirements.
Review and monitor government and private publications for information on new or updated laws, implementing plans to ensure compliance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or relevant military experience at or above a U.S. E6 or Canadian Petty Officer 2nd Class or Sergeant ranking. (Master’s degree preferred)
